attributes.review: after it took hours to download the app wouldnt even open!!! it was ridiculous. my phone then got hacked right after i downloaded it!!! i was just trying to suPpOrT the big fat orange🍊and it completely crashed my phone. im so disappointed. 🤢👎

This is the worst app ever. I hate it so much. I was trying to help our 🍊orange🍊president. But then when I went on the app I saw something disgusting. 😫😫. I would never do this again. AND IF YOU TRY TO TAKE AWAY TIC TOK GEN Z WILL FIGHT BACK!!! We all know you can’t read. But I would just drop out of the election. Your not going to win!!!
 😉😉😉
attributes.title: Really bad.

attributes.review: I opened the app and it immediately asked for my personal information. All I wanted to do was see if I could get the new Lil Peep concert tickets because that is what this app advertised for. I could not BELIEVE my eyes when it asked if I wanted to support our ✨CHEETOH✨ of a president. Worst app ever please do not download this.
attributes.title: Worst app EVER😡

attributes.review: This app didn’t let me get in without using my phone number to get calls and texts but I don’t think that is right. I shouldn’t have to give my personal information to a politician I would rather keep that to myself.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I hate this app so much. Please take down this app it is horrible and poorly made. Manny would be very disappointed in you. I mean I didn’t expect much from an app made by a random old man targeted to more old men but I didn’t think it would be THIS BAD. Anyways... what y’all want I’m going to Wendy’s?
attributes.title: Eww old men

attributes.review: So i saw the whole gen z thing but that not why i am here. The app itself didn’t work, kept freezing and glitching almosted cause my phone to crash, maybe it’s because i have a older iphone (7+) but idk, don’t get if your phone is running slow
attributes.userName: Killer app (not in a good way)
attributes.title: Not good

attributes.review: This app has nothing good to offer and neither does the person running it.  All his views are just garbage and honestly I’m not looking forward to seeing a stale as hell Cheeto you found in the back of your couch after losing it for 2 weeks in the Oval Office again.
attributes.title: Bad just bad

attributes.review: I was incredibly disappointed in the apps design and layout and the fact that the very first thing you have to do when you open the app is supply your phone number! Is there no other options?!
attributes.title: What a terrible app!!

attributes.review: Various bugs, consistently crashes, even after the app updates it still seems to have various bug and occasionally crashes. The app is basically useless.
attributes.title: App hasn’t been working for month. 😡😡

attributes.review: this app is horrible. it took 2 weeks to download and kept crashing every time i tried to use it. my phone broke 3 times when i tried to use the app and had to get it professionally fixed. i do NOT recommend this app!!
attributes.title: No❤️
